thinking.disposable_income: Midtown residents have relatively high disposable incomes with a median household income around $87,000, significantly above Houston's average.
thinking.discretionary_consumption: As a young professional-dominated area with many dining, entertainment, and retail options, residents have high discretionary spending on lifestyle amenities.
thinking.accessibility: Midtown has excellent multi-modal transportation access with MetroRail, multiple bus routes, bike lanes, and walkable streets, plus easy driving access to downtown and major employment centers.
thinking.decision_rationale: 1) Given high incomes, residents can absorb moderate fees/taxes while valuing time savings 2) Strong existing transit infrastructure means improvements will be well-utilized 3) Mixed-use urban character means both transit and driving options are important 4) Higher driver fees can help reduce congestion in this dense area 5) Moderate transit fares balance revenue generation with maintaining affordability 6) Proposals balancing all modes while generating funds for improvements are preferred
